g.aria-label: X-axis titled 'mean execution time in µs' for a linear scale with values from 0 to 22,000

Y-axis titled 'algorithm with kernel size 1024' for a discrete scale with 14 values: (JohT) kernelCentricConvolution, (JohT) kernelCentricConvolutionKernelOuter, (JohT) kernelCentricConvolutionTempScaledKernel, (JohT) kernelCentricConvolutionInnerLoopUnrolled, (JohT) kernelCentricConvolutionTempScaledOuterLoopKernel, ending with (matlab-like) convolution_valid
